item.ptxt: Be sure that the vehicle is on a level surface before starting the procedure.
When placing the weights on the vehicle, place approximately 60 kg (132 lb) above the specification first. Then remove weights as necessary to adjust the load.

s2.ptxt: Set SST, and bleed air from the brake system.
Raise the front brake fluid pressure to 10,000 kPa (102 kgf/cm2, 1,450 psi) when the brake pedal is depressed, and check the rear brake fluid pressure.

atten4.ptxt: The pedal should not be depressed twice or released while the specified pressure is being set. Read the value of the rear brake fluid pressure after adjusting and holding the specified brake fluid pressure for 2 seconds.
